name: RonSwansong
description:
Ron Swansong

Help Ron Swanson retire to a peaceful life in the Pawnee woods by gathering resources and defeating enemies.

Please take our Playtesting Survey!

.

Build: 2nd Beta Release (0.3b) 2022/03/16 12:50 EST
  • Move with WASD (sprint with Shift).
  • Jump with Spacebar.
  • Attack/Harvest with LMB.
  • Ranged Attack with RMB.
  • Healing Item with MMB.
  • Pause/Menu with Escape.
Debug Commands (Numpad)
  1.   +5 Wood
  2.   +5 Stone
  3.   +5 Material
  4.   +5 Meat
  5.   +1 Health
  6.   +1 Food
  7.   -1 Health
  8.   -1 Food
Known Issues
  • Some enemy/resource collider sizes need tuning
  • Bear pivot point needs adjusting
Credits

Design/Development: TJ Cioffe
Character & Prop Models: Simon Liu
Concept Art & UI: Xiyin Wang
Environment Models: Ke Jin
Additional Models: quaternius.com
VFX: archanor.com

GAM 651, MFA in Game Development at the Academy of Art University.
Midterm Project.
